relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y on Earth communities stewardship and sustainability podcast series.

former consultant at Sustainable Settings Ranch in Carbondale, Colorado.
He's born and raised at Sunrise Ranch.
attended the River Song Waldorf School.
later graduated from the International Baccalaureate Program in Fort Collins, Colorado.
After attending Evergreen State College.
working on permaculture based projects in Costa Rica and Panama.
he began farming in 2013 at Happy Heart Farm in Fort Collins.
In 2015, Stone began working at Sustainable Settings.
he completed a two year North American biodynamic apprenticeship program.
